title: This Could Be The Best Smartphone Camera
description:
This week we had a few rapid-fire topics as Marques and Andrew discuss everything from the new Xiaomi 12S Ultra smartphone to Tesla vehicles automatically adjusting the suspension to avoid potholes. After that, we finish up with a ton of trivia to round out season 1 of the trivia show! It's a fun one and things may or may not get a little chaotic towards the end. Hope you enjoy it!
